abstract: Update: The New York Times reported Friday afternoon that Ambac will split itself into two parts and raise $3 billion. The plan, drafted by a consortium of eight banks including Citigroup and UBS, still needs approval by the credit ratings agencies but could be formally unveiled as soon as Monday.
